column3: This fun motion simulation ride is a cool ride literally and figuratively. On a hot July day it's a pleasure to go into a nice cool air conditioned theater to enjoy this ride. The ride itself is fun for all ages as you ride along with the characters from Shrek and Kung Fu Panda.
This was our first show in Universal and we thought it was fantastic from the talk at the beginning and right through the film - really well done but advise a fast pass!
A 4D show you will love if you have watched the movies. The animation,action and magic make this a must visit experience for Shrek fans.
The Shrek 4-D provides a very good and short 4D movie of Shrek animation. If you are an animation lover do not miss it.

I loved this from the pre-show out! You get some real magic as your enter, and you need to pay attention. There are Easter Eggs as you are standing around, and the fun is a giggle!See the movies before you go, and it will be even more fun.

This is a 3D theater with moving seats, wind, water and mist that make it the 4D experience. After walking through Lord Farquaad's dungeon you enter the theater where you will join Shrek, donkey and dragon as they rescue Princess Fiona from the ghost of Lord Farquaad. Tons of action and a great 4D thrill. For those that don't want all the motion the seats at the back of the theater do not move.Must do when in Universal.
